content.question: Mekarskaâ€™s criticisms in the first paragraph best reflect which of the following developments of the nineteenth century?

choices.label: Increasing calls for democracy and popular sovereignty

topic.text: 6.7: Ideologies of Change and Reform Movements

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
